directions: Mix cinnamon whiskey, sweet vermouth, bitters, and maraschino cherry juice in a cocktail mixer, pour into a glass with ice, and garnish with a maraschino cherry.
ingredients: 3 fluid ounces cinnamon whiskey (such as Fireball®)
5 dashes bitters (such as Angostura®), or more to taste
title: Red Hot Manhattans
